title: Loving Kindness
author: The Odeol
citation: Citation:   The Odeol. "Loving Kindness: experience with Meditation & Nitrous Oxide (ID 57602)". Erowid.org. Feb 25, 2008. erowid.org/exp/57602
footer: Age at time of experience: Not Given

[ Switch Colors ]
report:
After 15 minutes of loving meditation
I inhaled nitrous
The patterns behind my eyelids formed sublime
The term mountainous love repeated 
A glimpse of pure love
We wear the world like clothes
Must be spiritual nudists
(buddhists)
Falling over in conversations
over words 
(sublime)
